contentfulCaseStudy.title: Reducing regression time by 50%â€‹
contentfulCaseStudy.seoDescription: Discover success story that leverage our simplified test automation reporting and AI-based defect triage system.

challenges.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-6","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"EPAM helps a Canadian retail company to reverse-engineer their legacy IBM-based store management system to a modern tech stack.
